meanings.definition: The act of cutting off someone's head.
meanings.sent1: The beheadal of the criminal was a shocking event.
meanings.sent2: The beheadal of the king was carried out in the public square.
meanings.sent3: The beheadal of the cake at the party was a fun way to celebrate.
meanings.sent4: The beheadal of the flower from its stem was like a sudden end to its beauty.
meanings.sent5: The beheadal of the statue made it look incomplete and broken.

meanings.sent1: After the beheadal, the headless body lay on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The beheadal left the kingdom in mourning for their lost leader.
meanings.sent3: The beheadal of the snowman in the sun was a comical sight.
meanings.sent4: The beheadal of the tree by the storm made it look like a giant fallen soldier.
meanings.sent5: The beheadal of the doll made it look like a forgotten toy.
